law.catch_line: Information to be given to individual filing new claim -- Deduction and withholding of income tax.

text.section: Amounts deducted and withheld from unemployment compensation shall remain in the unemployment fund until transferred to the federal taxing authority as a payment of income tax.
The secretary shall follow all procedures specified by the United States Department of Labor and the Federal Internal Revenue Service pertaining to the deducting and withholding of income tax.
Amounts shall be deducted and withheld in accordance with the priorities established in administrative regulations promulgated by the secretary.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 266, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1996.
